title: Journal of a Summer Tour in the Perthshire and Inverness-shire Highlands
author: Roger, James Cruikshank.
snippet: Butterstone Housewas lately the temporary residence of Mr. Glaelstone, the guest of its present occupant.

title: Journal of a Summer Tour in the Perthshire and Inverness-shire Highlands
author: Roger, James Cruikshank.
snippet: VisitedSt. Mary's Episcopal Church, Birnam, and foundthe grave of my old friend the late ThomasDuff, who died at Butterstone House in October,1890, his wife having preeleceased him iu theprevious September.
